dev_blurb:
Hello,

My name is Scott Bemis.  I'm a mechanical engineer with 20+ years of SolidWorks experience.  I have experience doing design work on castings, tubing, sheet metal, injection moldings, machined parts, reverse engineering, large assemblies, weldments, and GT&T drawings.  I own a personal licence of SolidWorks which includes version 14 through 17.

I am a full time freelancer on Upwork.

Communication is key.  I always strive to clearly understand my clients needs before starting any project to make sure we are in agreement on what the final product should be.

Let me help your design be a success!

PS: I do not do graphics or product renderings, I'm severely colorblind.  If you need someone to test your product from a colorblind perspective I'm your guy.

I also don't do any PCB layout, code writing / programming, or electrical engineering design work.

skill.skl_description: SolidWorks is a 3D mechanical CAD (computer-aided design) program that runs on Microsoft Windows and is being developed by Dassault Systmes SolidWorks Corp., a subsidiary of Dassault Systmes, S. A. (V_lizy, France).

experience.exp_comment: Production design - sheetmetal, tubing, enclosure design, component selection, prototyping, machined parts, drawing creation, assembly drawings, assembly instructions, & BOM's.
Production design - injection molded components, component selection, prototyping, machined parts, weldments, drawing creation, assembly drawings, & BOM's.

ag_description:
We have developed applications (both software and web) for some of the biggest companies and government agencies in the world.

The following are a few of my personal favorites:
   * Wrote a web application for a vacation property management company that succeeded in netting over $3M for 4 years straight.
  * Developed a cutting edge web/software/mobile application for a medium sized transportation company that manages *every* aspect of inbound and outbound shipments from purchase order to delivery confirmation.
  * Developed a Java application for a health care organization that manages the distribution of medicine to end of life patients around the country. This Java app shaved precious DAYS off of the delivery process and resulted in saved lives.
  * We presently consult on retainer for one of the oldest and largest paid submission search engines on the planet. This particular company using truly bleeding edge Microsoft technologies (.Net Framework 3.5, AJAX, Linq, and Silverlight).

In addition to our US staff, we recently opened an office in Cluj, Romania, in
order to offer a 24 hour development schedule. We are *not* the sort of
company that will simply offshore your work to another country. Our Romanian
developers work primarily with our European clients & clients whose timelines
require developers to be working around the clock.

******** 
Finally, while this is an agency account, I, the Principal Consultant do absolutely all of the Microsoft based development. I've been working with Microsoft technologies for more than twenty years now. The freelancers that I do have focus on the things I'm not good at like Graphics and most Linux based development. 
********
dev_blurb:
Personally, I'm a native-born American entrepreneur with 20 years of experience in developing technology based ventures! I'm not just merely a facilitator though, I can get right in there and sling code with the best of them. I've been consulting with a focus on Microsoft and Adobe based enterprise technologies since 1997. I've been a nomadic freelancer, since long before freelancing was cool. To say I'm a self starter would be putting it mildly. Presently, I'm living and growing my business in Europe and return to the United States once a quarter. 

I  have developed web and software applications for some of the biggest organizations throughout the world. Over the years I've become known as a turn around consultant, often turning a projects that have gone awry into successfully completed ones. Tired of poor communication and missed deadlines? Give me a call today!

The following are a few of my personal favorite projects:

* Produced a very modular web based "lead" and event management system for churches around the globe. 

* Wrote a web application for a vacation property management company that succeeded in netting over $1M for 4 years straight.

* Developed a cutting edge web/software/mobile application for a medium sized transportation company that manages *every* aspect of inbound and outbound shipments from purchase order to delivery confirmation.

* Developed a Java application for a health care organization that manages the distribution of medicine to end of life patients around the country. This Java app shaved precious DAYS off of the delivery process and resulted in saved lives.

* I presently consult on retainer for one of the oldest and largest paid submission search engines on the planet. This particular company using truly bleeding edge Microsoft technologies.

Some of my clients have included: 

The United States Department of Defense, South Carolina Department of Transportation, Verizon, eBay, IBM, BASF, bestoftheweb.com, State Farm Insurance, National Fidelity, UPS, and a plethora of other small and medium sized businesses.

My core technical competencies are: AJAX, ASP.Net, ASP, Authorize.net, Bootstrap, C#, ColdFusion, DotNetNuke, HTML 4/5, Javascript, jQuery, Kendo, MySql, SQL Server, Umbraco, and VB.Net.

feedback.comment:
Brandon did an excellent job. He's extremely knowledgable on Microsoft products, even the antiquated stuff we have to use on our server.

We actually had to do the job twice - my fault, due to a problem with our server - and he still came in at the same time and budget. We'll definitely be using him for future work.

experience.exp_comment:
*   Instrumental in recommending, directing, and implementing technical policies used throughout the company.  

*         Utilized Biztalk 2006, Business Rules Engine, and MSMQ over HTTPS to successfully implement an incentive solution for the 2nd largest insurance company in the world. The successful implementation is expected to double Incent One's profits in two years.  

*         Developed a system using VB.net and AJAX for Deloitte that dynamically generated forms, which enabled managers to issue awards to individuals.

*         Aided in the support of our C#/VB.net based "manual" data upload processes.

*        Supported and expanded upon existing Cold Fusion code base to meet client demands, diagnose, and repair bugs. 

*        Managed multinational eXternal Development team in upgrading our internal support applications from VB6 to ASP.net.

Technologies: ASP.Net 1.1, VB.Net, C#, Web Services, DTS, SQL Server 2000,
Reporting Services

  
Worked with managers and developers to aid in the completion of a major
overhaul of the client's technical infrastructure. The goal of the overhaul
was to modernize many of their mission critical operations, in such a way that
it would eliminate their dependence on legacy mainframe applications. The
systems developed were:

o Data Translator - This system consisted of a scheduler component which would
generate data detail files in flat file format, then process a series of
reports relating to sales, construction, 1099-MISC, and 1099-INT. In order to
provide the best cost to benefit ratio, I developed the system to utilize SQL
Server Reporting Services reports, which I converted into Excel, which finally
converted back into text format for distribution to the end user. The latter
two conversions were developed as a web service (C#) in order to promote reuse
in other

Technologies: ASP.Net 1.1, C#, SQL Server 2000, Reporting Services,
Infragistics Controls, MS Enterprise Library

Worked with solution architects and developers to aid in the completion of a
major rebuild to the client's business management system. The system utilized
a custom framework developed by Encore which broke the vital components of
development into their own separate classes (Data Access, Business Entities,
Business Rules, User Interface Persistence, and User Interface). I worked on
the following components:

•    Notes:  A C# class which is to be utilized by a considerable portion of
the framework.  The user control was developed in such a way that the user
could simply call a new instance of the user control and set a property, at
which point it would enumerate all notes relating to a particular entity in
the application. This of course, also included an interface for reading
existing notes and adding new notes.

*    Met with client to gather requirements and subsequently translate those requirements into a project plan.   
*    Developed system in C# with SQL Server 2000 backend to provide JumpAt customers's with their own advertising enabled portal (similar to a more graphical google). Developed rather vast management panel for customers and fellow jumpat executives to enable them to better manage their portals and accompanying advertising mediums. Accomplished with the assistance of two of my consultants under my leadership.  
*    Reverse engineered Google AdWords, with some mild additions and modifications.   
*    Spoke with investors / parters from a technical standpoint regarding the status of the application.

Technologies: ASP.Net, VB.Net 1.1, SQL Server 2000

*    Developed content manager that ameliorated their means for managing publications in ASP.net (with SQL Server backend and client-side Javascript).  
*    Developed decision support system to assist with the management of the organization during periods of  winter weather. The system keeps track of concurrent operations, materials expended/available, available equipment, and available personnel on the State, District, and County level.

Developed product enhancements for Echo's flagship products, AMASE and
ShareCare. AMASE is a web based general ledger product and ShareCare is
management software that is vertically marketed to the Mental Health Industry.
Echo contracted Jaesoft to modify their products so that they were compatible
with either Oracle or SQL Server and to develop new functionality, by July 15,
2003, the delivery date stipulated by their client, CADDIS (California
Developmental Disibilities Information System).  System utilized Cold Fusion
MX for the front-end development and a combination of SQL Server and Oracle
for the backend. Stored Procedures for both platforms were written in TOAD. My
focus was turning around a project that had gone astray and could have quite
possibly bankrupted the company.

In spite of numerous orders from senior management to migrate their Acess and
SQL Server databases to oracle, by April 1, 2002, on-site management did
nothing, until senior management  decided to cut off access to the access
databases (shipped the hard drive for the "access server" via FedEx). My job
was to upgrade all Access databases to Oracle utilizing Toad to write any
queries/stored procs and to modify the Cold Fusion pages to suit.

skill.skl_description: The .NET Framework (pronounced dot net) is a software framework developed by Microsoft that runs primarily on Microsoft Windows.

Active Server Pages (ASP) was Microsoft's first server-side script engine for dynamically generated web pages. Initially released as an add-on to Internet Information Services (IIS), it was subsequently included as a free component of Windows Server. ASP.NET has superseded ASP.

C# (pronounced see sharp) is a multi-paradigm programming language encompassing strong typing, imperative, declarative, functional, generic, object-oriented (class-based), and component-oriented programming disciplines.

ColdFusion is a commercial rapid application development platform. ColdFusion was originally designed to make it easier to connect simple HTML pages to a database, by version 2 (1996) it had become a full platform that included an IDE in addition to a "full" scripting language.
Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used to describe the presentation (that is, the look and formatting) of a document written in a markup language.

HTML5 is a language for structuring and presenting content for the World Wide Web, and is a core technology of the Internet originally proposed by Opera Software. It is the fifth revision of the HTML standard.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.

jQuery is a cross-browser JavaScript library designed to simplify the client-side scripting of HTML. Its syntax is designed to make it easier to navigate a document, select DOM elements, create animations, handle events, and develop Ajax applications.
Structured Query Language (SQL) is a programming language designed for managing data in relational database management systems (RDBMS).
Umbraco is an open source content management system (CMS) platform for publishing content on the World Wide Web and intranets. It is written in C# and deployed on Microsoft based infrastructure.

portfolio_items_v.pi_title: More Tests showing how well I stack up against the rest
Dynamic Rental Income / Expense Responsive App

dev_blurb:
Legal writing calls to mind a moth-eaten old codger poring over yellowed legal texts in a dimly lit room. 

Technical writing can be incomprehensible to the average bear. 

But it doesn't have to be that way. 

I simplify complex subjects to make them intelligible to the layman. 

I get what makes your target audience scratch their heads versus what they will actually understand. I know how to explain complicated topics so that they walk away from your blog feeling satisfied instead of perplexed. 

Many businessmen, lawyers, tech nerds, and other experts in their fields are awesome at their job - whether that means running a business, obscure litigation, staying up all night coding, or fly-fishing. 
But often, those experts are not so great at explaining how their field works to other people. And that makes sense. After all, you’re a businessman, not a writer. Your job is to run a company - and you're damn good at it. 

Attracting paying customers through your blog can be as simple as hitting the big green “Hire now” button on the top right. Contact me now to get the ball rolling.

institution.ed_comment: I earned 80 college credits, with an in-depth major in psychology and a steady 3.4 GPA. Then I discovered freelancing and never looked back.

feedback.comment: Elisheva delivered excellent work on my candidate statement for my graduate school application. She's not like other writers who only check grammar mistake or sentence structure. Instead, she guided me to brainstorm more detailed stories that I could put in my essay. I'm a non-native speaker, but Elisheva brought my essay to native English standards. I will definitely refer her to my peers.

feedback.comment:
When I first posted my editing job for my sports allegory w/ political undertones (The Peculiar Conundrum) Elisheva seemed especially in-tune with the work's nuances and underlying meanings.
She was my number one pick from the onset because her questions indicated she understood my projected path, but when the quotes came back in, Elisheva's bid was considerably higher than the remainder (perhaps because she was one of the few that understood what the job would really take).
I ended up first choosing another editor because my budget was tight, who did a wonderful job getting my book into far better shape (it was pretty rough to begin with).  But, I still wasn't quite happy with the end result, but I needed to be.   I contacted Elisheva when I was able to increase my budget and hired her to see if she could help me make it what I first envisioned.
Elisheva did a great job simplifying my message, taking complicated and precise phrasing and making it flow better.
I would recommend Elisheva especially for difficult projects; I kept most all of her edits and enjoyed quite a few of her re-phrasing of difficult topics into concepts easier to understand.
Thanks, Elisheva, for a job well done.

Professional writing involves the use of clear language to convey information in a way that is easily understood by the intended audience. Individuals who can use language well may be employed as full-time professional writers in a variety of communications-related occupations, such as

English is a West Germanic language that was first spoken in early medieval England and is now a global lingua franca.

Punctuation is "the use of spacing, conventional signs, and certain typographical devices as aids to the understanding and correct reading, both silently and aloud, of handwritten and printed texts.

skill.skl_description: The general definition of an audit is a planned and documented activity performed by qualified personnel to determine by investigation, examination, or evaluation of objective evidence, the adequacy and compliance with established procedures, or applicable documents, and the effectiveness of implementation.

Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) is an independent information security certification governed by the International Information Systems Security Certification Consortium, also known as (ISC).

Governance refers to all of processes of governing, whether undertaken by a government, market or network, whether over a family, tribe, formal or informal organization or territory and whether through the laws, norms, power or language.
The Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 was enacted by the United States in 1996.

Information security, sometimes shortened to InfoSec, is the practice of defending information from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, disruption, modification, perusal, inspection, recording or destruction.

Internal control, as defined in accounting and auditing, is a process for assuring achievement of an organization's objectives in operational effectiveness and efficiency, reliable financial reporting, and compliance with laws, regulations and policies.

The Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) is an information security standard for organizations that handle cardholder information for the major debit, credit, prepaid, e-purse, ATM, and POS cards.
A penetration test, occasionally pentest, is a method of evaluating the security of a computer system or network by simulating an attack from malicious outsiders and malicious insiders.

Risk management is the identification, assessment, and prioritization of risks followed by coordinated and economical application of resources to minimize, monitor, and control the probability and/or impact of unfortunate events or to maximize the realization of opportunities.
A vulnerability assessment is the process of identifying, quantifying, and prioritizing (or ranking) the vulnerabilities in a system.

ag_description: I am an intellectual property attorney with a law firm housed in Chicago. I provide services to businesses, individuals, and start-ups. I make myself available to clients at any time, for any reason.

dev_timezone: UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) Dublin, Edinburgh, London

skill.skl_description: Active Server Pages (ASP) was Microsoft's first server-side script engine for dynamically generated web pages. Initially released as an add-on to Internet Information Services (IIS), it was subsequently included as a free component of Windows Server. ASP.NET has superseded ASP.
Excel VBA (Visual Basic for Applications) is the programming language of Excel. Excel code processes are called Excel Macros.
Microsoft Office Access is a database management system from Microsoft that combines the relational Microsoft Jet Database Engine with a graphical user interface and software-development tools.

Microsoft Access, also known as Microsoft Office Access, is a database management system from Microsoft that combines the relational Microsoft Jet Database Engine with a graphical user interface and software-development tools.

Microsoft Excel is a proprietary commercial spreadsheet application written and distributed by Microsoft for Microsoft Windows and Mac OS X. It features calculation, graphing tools, pivot tables, and a macro programming language called Visual Basic for Applications.
Microsoft Office Word is a word processor designed by Microsoft.

Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) is an implementation of Microsoft's event-driven programming language Visual Basic 6 and its associated integrated development environment (IDE), which are built into most Microsoft Office applications.

VBScript (Visual Basic Scripting Edition) is an Active Scripting language developed by Microsoft that is modeled on Visual Basic. It is designed as a lightweight language with a fast interpreter for use in a wide variety of Microsoft environments.
Web development is a broad term for the work involved in developing a web site for the Internet (World Wide Web) or an intranet (a private network).
Writing is a medium of communication that represents language through the inscription of signs and symbols.

experience.exp_comment: Self employed programmer/writer/photographer

dev_blurb:
Design principal. Editor. P.R. Director.

My corporate experience demonstrates how I LOVE to communicate both visually and verbally. My goal? Visual communication with purpose. Whether your project is the layout of a 72-page magazine, a suite of branding pieces, or a conference brochure, I will approach it with "big picture" eyes. Aesthetics must meet practicality. Layout must meet purpose and function. Words should be clever, yet concise enough to answer every key question.

I will treat your project with the utmost​ respect and, of course, timeliness is essential. Your project's success begins with my careful listening – to your specs, ideas and needs. 

With 15+ years in the field, I am poised and experienced enough to take projects from concept (i.e., brand identity) to completion (print, post).

I look forward to working with you and am excited about the success of your upcoming project!

skill.skl_description: Adobe Creative Suite (CS) is a collection of graphic design, video editing, and web development applications made by Adobe Systems. The collection consists of Adobe's applications (e.g., Photoshop, Acrobat, InDesign), that are based on various technologies (e.g., PostScript, PDF, Flash).

A logo is a graphic mark or emblem commonly used by commercial enterprises, organizations and even individuals to aid and promote instant public recognition. Logos are either purely graphic (symbols/icons) or are composed of the name of the organization (a logotype or wordmark).

Print design is the process of creating and formatting projects using layout software that is ready to be printed by the end user. It is especially helpful when multiple persons or agencies are working on the same project.
Page layout is the part of graphic design that deals in the arrangement and style treatment of elements (content) on a page.

skill.skl_description: Adobe InDesign is a software application produced by Adobe Systems. It can be used to create works such as posters, flyers, brochures, magazines, newspapers and books. InDesign can also publish content suitable for tablet devices in conjunction with Adobe Digital Publishing Suite.
A blog is a personal journal published on the World Wide Web consisting of discrete entries ("posts") typically displayed in reverse chronological order so the most recent post appears first.

Event planning is the process of planning a festival, ceremony, competition, party, or convention. Event planning includes budgeting, establishing dates and alternate dates, selecting and reserving the event site, acquiring permits, and coordinating transportation and parking.

Internet research is the practice of using the Internet, especially the World Wide Web, for research. The internet is widely used and readily accessible to hundreds of millions of people in many parts of the world.
Lead generation, or lead gen is a marketing tool used, particularly in internet marketing, to generate consumer interest or inquiry into products or services of a business.
Marketing strategy is a process that can allow an organization to concentrate its limited resources on the greatest opportunities to increase sales and achieve a sustainable competitive advantage.
Social media marketing refers to the process of gaining traffic or attention through social media sites.

A transcription service is a business which converts speech (either live or recorded) into a written or electronic text document. Transcription services are often provided for business, legal, or medical purposes.
Typing is the process of writing or inputting text by pressing keys on a typewriter, keyboard, cell phone, or a calculator

dev_profile_title: International Marketing and Administrative Support Specialist

experience.exp_comment: As sponsorship coordinator, I contributed to all activities related to sponsorship of the annual Congress of the European Association of Hospital Pharmacists (EAHP), which attracts an international audience of up to 4.000 hospital pharmacists and pharmaceutical industry leaders each year. In addition to managing industry exhibition and satellite symposia sales, I coordinated logistics between exhibitors, satellite sponsors and suppliers prior to the event and provided print and digital marketing support to the Events/ Policy & Advocacy teams.
experience.exp_company: The European Association of Hospital Pharmacists

experience.exp_comment: As campaign specialist for the high-volume Chicago market, I managed and coordinated post-sales elements of digital advertising campaigns including inventory management, ad billing, ad placement using DART Sales Manager (DSM), and creative trafficking and troubleshooting using DART for Publishers (DFP). Additionally, I fostered trusting relationships with local market Sales and Operations teams and ensured that clients' performance goals were attained by monitoring daily ad delivery and utilizing digital optimization strategies to improve the performance of under-delivering campaigns.

As Local Sales Coordinator, I leveraged social media and SEO to attract new audiences to the Chicago Tribunes new digital product, ChicagoShopping.com. Each week, I consistently produced top-ranking fashion, beauty, and home content for the ChicagoShopping.com home page which contributed to the site reaching its post-launch pageviews target. Additionaly, I established and nurtured relationships with potential customers in Chicagoland while developing customized promotional solutions for existing local clients which included print, digital, and broadcast mediums within the Tribune Company portfolio.

As Brand Marketing intern for the Chicago Tribune, I developed a creative production schedule, managed budget, facilitated media placement and coordinated the attendance of WGN/Tribune personalities at 5 Ticket2Summer promotional events with excellent onsite execution. Additionally, I wrote copy for  advertisements featured daily on WGN radio to promote editorial events hosted by the Chicago Tribune. In addition to event planning, I also managed customer service escalations with ChicagoPOINTS loyality program members and developed contests via print and digital mediums to increase the number of subscribers to the program.

-

Throughout my internship with Zizzo Group Advertising and Public Relations, I completed transcriptions of  interviews with healthcare clients in order to help agency copywriters simplify medical terminology and allow consumers with average health literacy to understand the content of print collateral.
experience.exp_company: Zizzo Group Advertising and Public Relations

dev_blurb:
Thank you for visiting my profile. My name is Hui. I am a native Chinese speaker with a profound understanding of English language and culture. I have been studying and working in the United States for almost 10 years. My intensive training of academic writing guarantees that I can produce the accurate and concise translation with the correct forms of syntax and rhetoric. My working experience as an interpreter familiarizes me with a wide range of subject knowledge, including the protocols and terminologies in legal, financial, medical and technical fields. My strong interest in art, literature, and history prepares me the necessary background information when editing and localizing translated documents. Besides all of the above, I can type no less than 70 WPM and manage time efficiently. With all my expertise, I am confident that I can deliver your project with high quality, within your budget, and before your deadline. 

Thank you again for reading my profile. Please feel free to contact me with any questions. I will be happy to answer them for you.

skill.skl_description: Customer service is the provision of service to customers before, during and after a purchase.

Standard Chinese or Modern Standard Chinese, also known as Mandarin or Putonghua, is the official language of the People's Republic of China and Republic of China (Taiwan), and is one of the four official languages of Singapore.

A transcription service is a business which converts speech (either live or recorded) into a written or electronic text document. Transcription services are often provided for business, legal, or medical purposes.
Translation from English to Chinese and Chinese to English.
Translation from English to Chinese and Chinese to English.

dev_profile_title: Translation and Transcription from English to Chinese and vice versa

experience.exp_title_raw: Freelance English Chinese Translator and Interpreter

experience.exp_comment: Took lecture notes for hearing impaired students. Tutored Drawing, AfterEffects, Photoshop, Illustrator, Art History, Algebra, and Basic Math. Graded homework and quiz. Helped students to improve learning efficiency. Assisted in new student orientations and school galleries.
Created broadcast graphics and commercials. Operated Chyron for live news shows.

dev_blurb:
Hey there!

I'm a Fullstack Web developer, with +8 years of experience, five of them on upwork (odesk) :)

with quite some cool skills to help you!

on the back: Node, PHP (Yii & Yii2 Framework), Django
on front: Javascript / JQuery / Angular / React / Sass

Also, I enjoy building Wordpress plugins, shortcodes in order to extend the standard core of it.

You don't see the skill you need here? tell me what is it I am willing to research and learn it, so I can be helpful for your project / business

I am native Spanish speaker, and I am fluent on English as well..

looking forward for new opportunities, and if you got a visa sponsor position on US or Canada.. say no more I'm in!

skill.skl_description: AngularJS is an open-source web application framework, maintained by Google and community, that assists with creating single-page applications, one-page web applications that only require HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on the client side.
Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

"Ionic, a free and open source framework, offers a library of mobile-optimized HTML, CSS and JS components, gestures, and tools for building interactive apps. It is built with Sass and optimized for AngularJS."

Node.js is a software system designed for writing highly-scalable internet applications, notably web servers. Programs are written in JavaScript, using event-driven, asynchronous I/O to minimize overhead and maximize scalability.
React is an open-source JavaScript library for creating user interfaces that aims to address challenges encountered in developing single-page applications.
WordPress is a free and open source blogging tool and content management system (CMS) powered by PHP and MySQL. It has many features including a plug-in architecture and a template system.
Yii is an open source, object-oriented, component-based PHP web application framework. Yii is pronounced as "Yee" or [ji:] and it's an acronym for "Yes It Is!".

ag_description:
At Specialists in Language Services (SLS) we provide a wide range of language services for your business needs. Our team of linguists can provide your business with exceptional service and our aim is your recommendation.

Are you looking for a qualified translator?

We are a multidisciplinary team with a strong background in translation, education and customer service. We consist of native speakers in the following languages: Spanish (Latin America and Spain), Chinese (simplified and traditional), Korean, Vietnamese, Russian, Italian, French, Portuguese (Brazil and Portugal), Ukrainian, German, Dutch, Indonesian, Japanese, Arabic, Persian, Romanian, Tagalog, and English (UK and USA). You can be sure that all work will be done and completed to the highest possible standard and in a timely fashion. If the language you are looking for is not listed, please ask.

Translation

We offer translation services in the following language pairs

English-Spanish-English
Spanish-Italian-Spanish
English-Italian-English
English-Korean-English
English-Chinese-English
English-Vietnamese-English
etc.

Transcription

We can transcribe audio and video materials. We also offer direct transcription into English from the aforementioned languages.

Proofreading

Our proofreading service will ensure that any texts written in the languages we offer are 100% accurate in terms of spelling, grammar, vocabulary and content.

All our linguists have been individually assessed and all of them are professional, experienced translators. Most of them hold a BA degree in English or Translation. Some even hold a Master's degree. Our standard is to provide proofread translations, ready to be printed/published.

We specialize in the following fields: IT, marketing, media and entertainment, business, tourism, medical, finance, literature, politics, education, fashion, religion, binary options, automotive, real estate, legal, general.

Whether you need a quick translation or are embarking on a large project, we are confident of meeting your needs.

We also offer DTP services if needed.
dev_blurb:
"I am so thrilled with my decision to hire Marissa. She finished this lengthy project exactly on schedule, and the results are exactly what I needed. If you are looking for a translator, look no further! Marissa is excellent, and she will not disappoint you."

If you need to translate a document from English into Spanish, or transcribe/translate a Spanish audio/video, then you have arrived at the right place! 

I understand it can be quite difficult to trust a person that you don't know (yet) to translate the original message accurately, especially if you don't speak the target language. That's why it's important that you know firsthand that the translations I produce are of the highest quality, accuracy and are grammatically correct. I consistently receive positive feedback; please, read below for some comments left by my clients:

"Marissa was fantastic when doing my translations. She always communicated deadlines, and was prompt in answering communications."

"Marissa is, first of all, very serious and professional. She does all necessary to ensure that the work she will deliver will be perfect."

If you need to double check translations made by other professionals, I also provide editing/proofreading services. I'll make sure that the translation is not only correct and accurate, but that it also flows naturally. I can also proofread your Spanish texts and make sure they are error-free.

"Marissa went above and beyond to complete the work. She also helped me realize that a translator I previously trusted had many inaccuracies. I respect her hard work and great attention to detail, and only wish she spoke all of the other languages as well!"

I specialize in:
- Legal,
- Financial, 
- Marketing, and
- Business translations.

However, I also enjoy translating other types of texts, such as those related to:
- Technical/User Manuals,
- Non-fiction e-books,
- Religion,
- Nutrition, 
- Fitness, 
- Gastronomy, 
- Tourism/Travel, and
- Hospitality.

"Job completed on time, error free and surpassing my expectations. Will definitely recommend to anyone seeking a professional translator!"

If what you need is a transcript, it's equally important that you get a guarantee that the transcripts are accurate and error-free, especially if these transcripts are going to be used for legal cases. If you are going to transcribe a video or audio it's because the content is really important and an inaccurate transcript would be worthless. 

I have transcribed:
- Documentaries,
- Interviews, 
- Police interrogations, 
- 911 calls, 
- Interviews, 
- Podcasts, 
- Seminars, 
- Focus groups, etc. 

Confidentiality is really important for my clients, therefore, I can't provide samples of my transcripts.  However, I'd naturally be very happy to perform a short sample transcription of your choosing to showcase my skills.

The following comment was left by one of my clients, a large transcription company in the USA, after I finished the first transcription/translation I did for them:

"As my proofreader said "Wow! This is . . . perfect!" Great job, excellent communicator, very nice, quick turnaround. She is fantastic. Thank you for a great job, Marissa!"

And other clients said:

"Marissa is amazing!!! The quality of her work is excellent . Her communication and attention to every detail of the project makes her my first choice everytime."

"Marissa is extremely hard-working and definitely up for a challenge. She makes the effort to research details and make her transcripts as accurate as possible. Thank you!"

I invite you to contact me and tell me about the project you'd like me to work on. Just click on the green "Contact" button at the top right of this page.

I look forward to hearing from you!

skill.skl_description: Italian is a Romance language spoken mainly in Europe: Italy, Switzerland, San Marino, Vatican City, by minorities in Malta, Monaco, Croatia, Slovenia, France, Libya, Eritrea, and Somalia, and by immigrant communities in the Americas and Australia.
SDL Trados is a computer assisted translation software suite. It provides translation memory and terminology management.

Spanish (espaol) is a Romance language named for its origins as the native tongue of a large proportion of the inhabitants of Spain. Spanish is the second most natively spoken language in the world, after Mandarin Chinese.

A transcription service is a business which converts speech (either live or recorded) into a written or electronic text document. Transcription services are often provided for business, legal, or medical purposes.
Translation is the communication of the meaning of a source-language text by means of an equivalent target-language text.
Translation from English to Spanish and Spanish to English.
Translation from English to Italian and Italian to English.
Translation from English to Spanish and Spanish to English.

portfolio_item.pi_title: Proofreading and Translation of Dating Website

dev_timezone: UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) Dublin, Edinburgh, London

tsexam.ts_name_raw: oDesk Readiness Test for Agency Contractors
oDesk Readiness Test for Independent Contractors and Staffing Managers

dev_profile_title: Spanish Translator - Business, Law, Finance - ATA Member

experience.exp_comment: Leading the team at the Pumpkin Coffee Shop and Starbucks Coffee (Franchise). Cash handling, problem solving.

Translation of technical and non-technical documents, books, websites, apps, etc. in the following language pairs: EN-SP, SP-EN and IT-SP.
Transcription of Spanish audios and videos: documentaries, interviews, focus groups, seminars, police interrogations, etc.
Proofreading of translations and transcriptions in Spanish. 
Data entry.

Opening and closing of the restaurant. Plan and promote new events on the restaurants, buffets, gourmet dinners, etc. Ensure customer satisfaction in every step of the process, since they make an enquiry online or over the phone, until after the service. Get new customers for the new services being offered (ie. companies for daily lunch deliveries). Manage money and staff.

I started as a cupcake attendant, helping out my manager and providing excellent service to our guests. I was promoted to Cupcake Store Manager in my first contract, which is very unlikely in the Industry. The experience ratings went up, passing historical records and the revenue was the best since two years ago when the shop opened in Oasis of the Seas.

Opening and closing of the restaurant/coffee shop/bar.  Reviewing the inventory and buying supplies.  Manage money and staff.  Ensure customer service is consistently high.  Organize special events.  Prepare staff schedules.  Keep record of supplies and cash.

Supervise and manage staff.  Ensure customer satisfaction.  Manage the store’s economic performance.  Set goals for the team.  Implementation of best practices.  Develop partners.  Customer service.  Cash handling and management.  Personnel management.  Problem resolution.  Deal with suppliers.  Make supply orders. Staff recruitment.  Inventory.  Monitoring quality.

dev_blurb:
Designing is my passion and I love to bring my ideas to reality.

For over more than 8 years in the creative design industry, I've completed hundreds of projects for both print and digital media and I really take pride in my work. I have excellent knowledge of Adobe's Graphic Suite, especially: Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign.

I have a great sense of color and typography. I'm also quite skillful with applications such as: 3D Studio Max, Z-Brush and Sketchbook Pro.

Unlike the majority of my competitors, I am equipped with a top spec PC, a Wacom tablet and I can create designs with precision without the worry of under performing hardware.

I love to attain success through hard work, excellent communication, determination and I always maintain that all important 'Eye for Detail and Accuracy'. Furthermore, I'm always conscious of any deadline of assigned tasks.

Share your ideas and let's create something great together!

skill.skl_description: Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Adobe Systems.

Adobe Photoshop Lightroom is a photography software program developed by Adobe Systems for Mac OS X and Microsoft Windows, designed to assist Adobe Photoshop users in managing large quantities of digital images and doing post production work.
Adobe Photoshop is a graphics editing program developed and published by Adobe Systems Incorporated.

A web banner or banner ad is a form of advertising on the World Wide Web delivered by an ad server. This form of online advertising entails embedding an advertisement into a web page. It is intended to attract traffic to a website by linking to the website of the advertiser.

Cover art is the illustration or photograph on the outside of a published product such as a book (often on a dust jacket), magazine, comic book, video game ("box art"), DVD, CD, videotape, or music album.
An electronic book is a book-length publication in digital form, consisting of text, images, or both, readable on computers or other electronic devices.

A logo is a graphic mark or emblem commonly used by commercial enterprises, organizations and even individuals to aid and promote instant public recognition. Logos are either purely graphic (symbols/icons) or are composed of the name of the organization (a logotype or wordmark).
Image editing encompasses the processes of altering images, whether they be digital photographs, traditional analog photographs, or illustrations.

Print design is the process of creating and formatting projects using layout software that is ready to be printed by the end user. It is especially helpful when multiple persons or agencies are working on the same project.

experience.exp_comment: Main responsibility includes but not limited to creating print ready designs for a women's hand bag brand. I'm also responsible for creating all the marketing materials for different product lines.
I was responsible for developing a training manual to teach stitching "Moccasin" shoes. The program was for rural women, so it has to be very easy going and precise.

It was a construction company that builds industrial steel buildings. My role was to manage all designing aspects of their business which includes- visualization of proposed projects, designing branding elements, billboards and so on.

I started my professional career as a graphic designer with this ad agency. My main role was to create graphic contents according to lead designer's instructions. I worked on many ad campaigns for different businesses like Unilever Bangladesh, Nestle Bangladesh, etc.

I learned a lot of things here that helped me to move my career forward.

dev_blurb:

 Very Good experience at WFO, AACC, AEP, SBC and Presence.

skill.skl_description: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a style sheet language used to describe the presentation (that is, the look and formatting) of a document written in a markup language.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.

Node.js is a software system designed for writing highly-scalable internet applications, notably web servers. Programs are written in JavaScript, using event-driven, asynchronous I/O to minimize overhead and maximize scalability.

Vue.js is a library for building interactive web interfaces. The goal of Vue.js is to provide the benefits of reactive data binding and composable view components with an API that is as simple as possible.

skill.skl_description: CodeIgniter is an open source web application framework for use in building dynamic web sites with PHP.
Drupal is a free and open-source content management system (CMS) and content management framework (CMF) written in PHP and distributed under the GNU General Public License.

Joomla is a free and open source content management system (CMS) for publishing content on the World Wide Web and intranets and a model_view_controller (MVC) Web application framework that can also be used independently.

"LAMP (""Linux, Apache, MySQL and PHP"") is an acronym for a solution stack of free, open source software, referring to: Linux (operating system), Apache HTTP Server, MySQL (database software) and PHP (or sometimes Perl or Python), principal components to build a viable web server."

Magento is an open source based ecommerce web application that was launched on March 31, 2008. It was developed by Varien (now Magento Inc) with help from the programmers within the open source community but is owned solely by Magento Inc..
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.
WordPress is a free and open source blogging tool and content management system (CMS) powered by PHP and MySQL. It has many features including a plug-in architecture and a template system.

dev_blurb:
I'm a WordPress developer who handles WordPress development and maintenance for several SEO & Marketing agencies. I know what it takes to keep your site running smoothly so that you can focus on your business, not your website.

My skills include, but are not limited to following: 
- Wordpress Theme Development
- Wordpress Plugin Development
- API integrations with plugins and themes
- Woocommerce customization and updates
- eCommerce Website Development (Magento, Shopify)
- Web Applications (PHP)
- Website Performance Optimization: PageSpeed Insights, GTMetrix, YSlow, Pingdom
- VPS & Dedicated Server Performance Optimization

I've worked with lots of the well-known themes including Avada, Jupiter, The7, Divi, and many others. I've also custom built themes, built over 100 child themes for clients, and designed and built custom themes tailored to the clients requirement.

I work with common free & premium plugins including Gravity Forms, Event Calender Pro, Event Tickets Plus,  Visual Composer, WooCommerce, WP Rocket, WP Total Cache, Revolution Slider, and many others.

I focus on long term business relationships and many of my clients have been with me for years.

skill.skl_description: Google Website Optimizer was a free website optimization tool that helped online marketers and webmasters increase visitor conversion rates and overall visitor satisfaction by continually testing different combinations of website content.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.

Magento is an open source based ecommerce web application that was launched on March 31, 2008. It was developed by Varien (now Magento Inc) with help from the programmers within the open source community but is owned solely by Magento Inc..
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.

Web development is a broad term for the work involved in developing a web site for the Internet (World Wide Web) or an intranet (a private network). This can include web design, web content development, client liaison, client-side/server-side scripting, web server and network security
WooCommerce is an open source e-commerce plugin for WordPress that was launched on September 27, 2011.
WordPress is a free and open source blogging tool and content management system (CMS) powered by PHP and MySQL. It has many features including a plug-in architecture and a template system.

ag_description:
I have been in the e-learning industry since 1993 and authored high quality training content using Flash, Articulate Storyline and Adobe Captivate. I have developed more than 200 hours of eLearning content for fortune 500 companies such as Nike, NYT, Citibank, Apple, Adobe, Oracle, Willy and others. 

I have delivered complete range of quality e-Learning courses ranging from Level 1 to Level 3. I have the ability to deliver small to large scale e-Learning projects economically using rapid content development methodologies, processes and best practices.
dev_blurb:
Here is what my clients have been saying:

"Anand was incredibly responsive. This was a first assignment, but he quickly understood my requirements and made every effort to meet them."

"Fast and detail-oriented"

"Anand is a joy to work with.  He is very patient with changes and delays, always professional and produces exceptional work.  Looking forward to future collaborations!!!!"

"Excellent quality and very quick response: I would definitely recommend this freelancer"

"Anand was great to work with.  He work was excellent, and he was patient as requirements and timelines changed.  I hope to get the opportunity to work with him again.  Thanks!!"

================================================================

- Experience: Developing eLearning content from past 20 years, since 1993. 

- Clients I Served Recently: Nike, NYT, Citibank, Cambridge English, Adobe, Oracle, Willy, Wipro Technologies

- Expert in: e-Learning, Mobile Learning, ILT, Instructional Design, Technical Writing

- Tools & Technologies: Articulate Storyline, Articulate 360, Adobe Captivate, LMS, Moodle, LearnDash, After Effects, iSpring, Lectora, Camtasia, SCORM, Virtual Reality, Blackboard LMS

- Type of Course Content Development: Software simulations, product & informational courses, new hire curricula, compliance & safety training, customer service & soft-skills courses, K-12, Higher education

skill.skl_description: Adobe Captivate is an electronic learning tool for Microsoft Windows, and from v.5 Mac OS X which can be used to author software demonstrations, software simulations, branched scenarios, and randomized quizzes in .swf format.
Articulate provides platform to create interactive courses, tutorials.

A curriculum is the set of courses, and their content, offered at a school or university. A curriculum is prescriptive, and is based on a more general syllabus which merely specifies what topics must be understood and to what level to achieve a particular grade or standard.

E-learning comprises all forms of electronically supported learning and teaching. The information and communication systems, whether networked learning or not, serve as specific media to implement the learning process.

Instructional Design (also called Instructional Systems Design (ISD)) is the practice of creating instructional experiences which make the acquisition of knowledge and skill more efficient, effective, and appealing.

Lectora is an Electronic learning (elearning) development tool, also known as authoring software, developed by Trivantis Corporation. Lectora is used to create online training courses, assessments, and presentations.

Moodle (abbreviation for Modular Object-Oriented Dynamic Learning Environment) is a free source e-learning software platform, also known as a Course Management System, Learning Management System, or Virtual Learning Environment (VLE).

Sharable Content Object Reference Model (SCORM) is a collection of standards and specifications for web-based e-learning. It defines communications between client side content and a host system called the run-time environment, which is commonly supported by a learning management system.

Technical writing, a form of technical communication, is a style of writing used in fields as diverse as computer hardware and software, engineering, chemistry, the aerospace industry, robotics, finance, consumer electronics, and biotechnology.

ag_description:
Sliceart is your design and development partner providing you with innovative and value-added JavaScript development services with strong HTML/CSS and UI/UX expertise.

We can help you build rich, highly fast and responsive web and mobile applications with the best JavaScript development solutions.

Our key services are:

☑️ UI/UX design
☑️ JavaScript Development (with main focus on AngularJS)
☑️ HTML/CSS Development
☑️ Email Templates Development
☑️ WordPress Development

We have a strong expertise in: 
✔️ Photoshop/Sketch/Prototyping tools
✔️ Javascript Core
✔️ Javascript MVC: AngularJS, Angular 2/4, TypeScript, Rx.JS, Observables; React, Redux, GraphQL, Apollo, jQuery, Vue.JS
✔️ NodeJS / Express / MongoDB
✔️ HTML5 Semantics and API (Video, Audio, Geolocation, LocalStorage, SessionStorage)
✔️ HTML5 Graphics: SVG, Canvas
✔️ HTML Preprocessors: Jade, HAML
✔️ HTML Templating: Handlebars, Mustache
HTML Email Templates
✔️ CSS2 / CSS3
✔️ CSS Preprocessors: Sass (Bourbon, Neat, Susy, Compass) / SCSS / Less
✔️ CSS Frameworks: Twitter Bootstrap / Zurb Foundation
✔️ Responsive / Adaptive Web Design, Mobile-first Development
✔️ Grunt /Gulp/Webpack/Yarn/NPM
✔️ PHP
✔️ MySQL
✔️ Wordpress

What will we contribute to your project?

☑️ cutting-edge web solutions, as we are constantly improving our coding standards in order to stay tuned to the latest development trends;
☑️ high-quality product, because we follow a well-balanced code standard and have in-house QA engineers to make sure our clients are delivered bug-free solutions;
☑️ feedback, the most important part. Since listening, understanding and fulfilling our clients' requirements are the core principles our company is based on;
☑️ responsibility for every piece of a result, as we do care about meeting your business needs. Your success is ours too.

Just feel free to contact us and together we will convert your idea into Reality.
dev_blurb:
Hello there,
I am a professional Wordpress developer with a solid experience in developing websites, themes, plugins, widgets  for different types of businesses.
Communication is a key to success for me. I always try to dig deeper into business logic in order to deliver a really valuable product that will meet or even exceed your expectations. Wordpress is a good choice if you a seeking for gorgeous product without heavy coding and I am here to make it happen.
With the true passion for Wordpress development, I focus on delivering a quality product that you will easily support yourself.
I am very flexible due to following Agile principles and Scrum and always strive to improve my skills and come up with new ideas on how to make your project even greater!

Skills & Expertise
Wordpress
PHP
MySQL
Joomla 
Drupal 
PHPmyadmin 
NetBeans IDE 
Sublime 
HTML5/CSS3 
SASS/LESS
JavaScript, jQuery, jQuery UI
Bootstrap 
Jade 
Yeoman, Grunt, Bower

Drop me a line and let’s create a great product together!

feedback.comment:
Aliya did very high quality work. She is a gifted programmer and very good with Drupal. 

I would encourage future employers to ensure that good logs AND backups are performed regularly of files AND the database. 

In our case our client's hosting company didn't have good backups, and when something came up they blamed us - guessing that Aliya had made an error. It was not her error, but because we didn't have copious backups and logs we ended up unable to prove it to them satisfactorily and lost the work. 

ALWAYS HAVE GOOD LOGS AND BACKUPS.

I will be recommending Aliya and crew to anyone I know that need a Drupal Web Master. One more thing, Aliya is one of the nicest ladies I know. ag_description:
YAS Global is a web strategy, web design, consultancy and application development company providing a full range of services. Our offerings include affordable web design, professional web development, custom web programming, ecommerce solutions, custom application development, corporate identity design, outsourced offshore software development, search engine optimization (SEO).
 
Our goal is to provide effective web solutions that are focused on reducing your costs and adding to your bottom line. We have been providing web development services in many countries across the globe. Because we're committed to developing long-lasting relationships with our customers, we know that our success is based directly on your success.

We have built virtually unlimited number of sites ranging from brochure websites to complex database driven web portals. We are powerfully submerged in web design and development with strong emphasis on PHP and ASP.NET. We are masters of the open source platform like Drupal, joomla, wordpress, osCommerce . We are very proficient in full fledge tailor-made flash websites which also include Adobe After Effects, 3D Studio Max, Swift 3D Animations. We have extensive background in Flash Actionscript.

The programming languages we use include&hellip;
PHP, ASP.NET, C++, JavaScript, Visual Basic, Flash, HTML, XHTML, CSS and XML.
dev_blurb:
I have 12+ years of programming experience with expertise in PHP and Open Source applications like WordPress, Drupal, Joomla, magento etc. I am working on drupal extensively from last 9 years, both on theme and module development (drupal 5, 6,  7 & 8).

I express my creativity and professionalism through developing clean, minimal, and quality web design products. I also feel that I am a very productive person which comes from striving to be my best.  In fact, I am always trying to come up with new ideas to challenge the expected with innovative illustrations in an effort to rework the standards of design today.

My core competency lies in complete end-end management of a new website development project, and I am seeking opportunities to build websites from the ground up for you or your business.

I have experience using source control tools like Git, SVN, CVS and Visual Source Safe and bug tracking tools like bugzilla, Jira, Trello, basecamp and fogbugz.

skill.skl_description: Drupal is a free and open-source content management system (CMS) and content management framework (CMF) written in PHP and distributed under the GNU General Public License.

HTML5 is a language for structuring and presenting content for the World Wide Web, and is a core technology of the Internet originally proposed by Opera Software. It is the fifth revision of the HTML standard.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
MySQL is a relational database management system (RDBMS) that runs as a server providing multi-user access to a number of databases.
PHP is a general-purpose server-side scripting language originally designed for web development to produce dynamic web pages.
WordPress is a free and open source blogging tool and content management system (CMS) powered by PHP and MySQL. It has many features including a plug-in architecture and a template system.

skill.skl_description: Adobe Photoshop is a graphics editing program developed and published by Adobe Systems Incorporated.
A web banner or banner ad is a form of advertising on the World Wide Web delivered by an ad server. This form of online advertising entails embedding an advertisement into a web page.
Display advertising is a type of advertising that typically contains text (i.e., copy), logos, photographs or other images, location maps, and similar items.
"DoubleClick for Publishers (DFP) Small Business is a free ad management solution that helps growing publishers sell, schedule, deliver, and measure all of their digital ad inventory."

Facebook marketing is social media marketing specifically targeted for the website Facebook. Social media marketing refers to the process of gaining website traffic or attention through social media sites.
Google AdWords is Google's main advertising product and main source of revenue.

Graphic design is a creative process - most often involving a client and a designer and usually completed in conjunction with producers of form (i.e., printers, signmakers, etc.) _ undertaken in order to convey a specific message (or messages) to a targeted audience.

HTML5 is a language for structuring and presenting content for the World Wide Web, and is a core technology of the Internet originally proposed by Opera Software. It is the fifth revision of the HTML standard.
Mobile advertising is a form of advertising via mobile (wireless) phones or other mobile devices. It is a subset of mobile marketing.
Web design is the process of planning and creating a website. Text, images, digital media and interactive elements are used by web designers to produce the page seen on the web browser.

dev_blurb:
Are you looking for a translation that IMPRESS your clients, BOOST THE VISIBILITY of your website, ATTRACT the right person to your business or CLEARLY COMMUNICATE the instruction of your manual?

Do you want the content to reflect the enthusiasm, magnetism and the expertise of the original text? Do you want more than ACCURATE, word conversion? I know you do and I can give you what you are looking for! Go to my work history and read the comments and feedback from my previous clients. They were AMAZED with my work because my translation is a blend of ACCURACY and ORIGINALITY.

I go beyond word conversion and convey the heart of the original text in a style that is appropriate to the French language. Your reader will be CAPTIVATED with a content that speaks to them on a PERSONAL LEVEL.

In addition to my Job Success Rate and the TOP RATED status, here are few more things to consider: I am a French native speaker. I have more than 10 years of experience. I lived in various countries/cultures and understand its impact on language and communication. I continue to grow and “learn, unlearn and relearn”.

Are you ready? CONTACT ME NOW! I am always online and respond very quickly.

P.S. Still looking for more proof? I have samples of my previous work under my profile’s portfolio.

skill.skl_description: Aviation is the design, development, production, operation, and use of aircraft, especially heavier-than-air aircraft.

Christian theology is the enterprise to construct a coherent system of Christian belief and practice based primarily upon the texts of the Old Testament and the New Testament as well as the historic traditions of the faithful.

Creative writing is considered to be any writing, fiction, poetry, or non-fiction, that goes outside the bounds of normal professional, journalistic, academic, and technical forms of literature. Works which fall into this category include novels, epics, short stories, and poems.
Spelling is writing or stating the letters and diacritics of a word. Words generally have accepted standard spellings which can vary regionally or nationally.

Proofreading (also proof-reading) is the reading of a galley proof or computer monitor to detect and correct production-errors of text or art. Proofreaders are expected to be consistently accurate by default because they occupy the last stage of typographic production before publication.
A sales letter is a piece of direct mail which is designed to persuade the reader to purchase a particular product or service in the absence of a salesman.
Technical editing involves reviewing text written on a technical topic, and identifying usage errors and ensuring adherence to a style guide.

Technical translation is a type of specialized translation involving the translation of documents produced by technical writers, or more specifically, texts which relate to technological subject areas or texts which deal with the practical application of scientific and technological information.
Translation from English to French and French to English.
Translation from English to French and French to English.

dev_group.htmlblob_profile:
Welcome to the Pligg Group on oDesk!  The purpose of this group is to help Pligg CMS users find and hire high caliber contractors for template design, module development, customization, and support projects.  

After you post a job to this group, you will start receiving contractor applications for your job.  Contractor applications include verified work histories, feedback ratings, pay rate data, work experience, and other information to help you evaluate applicants.  The oDesk platform enables you to hire, manage, and pay your online contractors.  

Group Membership Criteria: we are looking for contractors with high feedback ratings that have experience with PHP, Smarty, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and Pligg.

dev_blurb:
I am an innovative full stack developer with over four years of experience working in various areas of software development. With excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently, I have gained a lot of experience by working directly with clients and handling projects individually. I have a thorough knowledge and understanding of advanced development methodologies, and I am able to provide meaningful contributions in the design, installation, testing and maintenance of many types of software systems. Working from initial concepts through to the delivery and implementation of cutting-edge software solutions, I am often involved in multiple sections of developing each new project, and considered a valuable member of each team.

As a versatile professional, I am capable of conceptualizing and supporting critical frameworks and formative web applications. My colleagues know me to be intrinsically motivated in areas of problem solving – my ability to analyse obstacles from a unique perspective allows me to creatively develop multiple pathways from which to tackle problems. I also excel in conducting research and gathering data for developing practical and original solutions, and am highly efficient in facilitating the implementation of these solutions. Troubleshooting is an inevitable part of software development, but approaching it with a positive attitude allows for final products to push the boundaries of their requirements, and achieve what originally seem unattainable.

I am well versed in multiple areas that interconnect across the industry, with a strong focus on integrating web, mobile and desktop environments to ensure customer satisfaction. Working directly with clients has therefore also allowed me to develop a stronger understanding of user needs in order to best create an individually customized software solution. In order to be at the forefront of technological advances and software innovations, I believe it is vital to consistently push for a better product, rather than one that simply satisfies the basic requirements. This is the goal I continuously work towards, and it is what inspires the latest developments in the world of programming.

Known for a high-energy, self-organized and meticulous approach to projects, I have both team-building and leadership experience centred around streamlining processes for maximum efficiency. This is best achieved through a combination of quality, usability, security and scalability, and these are the core tenets that I expect myself to achieve for any project. I am a self-starter with a high level of motivation, and I am always eager to apply myself to projects in new ways. I also work well with colleagues and superiors, particularly due to my desire to improve myself – I am not hesitant to ask for suggestions and criticism, using them as a crucial opportunity to further perfect both my own processes as well as the end product.

Technical Summary

1. .NET, C#, VB .NET, WinForm, ASP .NET, ASP. NET Core, WebForm, MVC & WebAPI
2. MSSQL, Oracle
3. SQL, EF, Linq
4. JQuery, SignalR
5. Crystal Report
6. HTTP POST/GET API
7. SMTP, GitHub, BitBucket
8. Azure, SmarterASP & GoDaddy

skill.skl_description: ASP.NET is a Web application framework developed and marketed by Microsoft to allow programmers to build dynamic Web sites, Web applications and Web services.
The ASP.NET MVC Framework is a web application framework that implements the model-view-controller (MVC) pattern.

C# (pronounced see sharp) is a multi-paradigm programming language encompassing strong typing, imperative, declarative, functional, generic, object-oriented (class-based), and component-oriented programming disciplines.

Crystal Reports is a business intelligence application used to design and generate reports from a wide range of data sources. Several other applications, including Microsoft Visual Studio, at one time bundled an OEM version of Crystal Reports as a general purpose reporting tool.
ADO.NET Entity Framework (EF) is an object-relational mapping (ORM) framework for the .NET Framework.

Language Integrated Query (LINQ, pronounced "link") is a Microsoft .NET Framework component that adds native data querying capabilities to .NET languages, although ports exist for Java, PHP and JavaScript.
Microsoft SQL Server is a relational database management system developed by Microsoft.
Visual Basic .NET (VB.NET) is a multi-paradigm, high level programming language, implemented on the .NET Framework.

dev_profile_title: Full Stack Developer - C# | ASP.NET | MSSQL

experience.exp_comment: For this project, I worked across multiple frameworks and databases, including C#, ASP.NET, Oracle & Crystal Report. I also made a Welpac Management System, and facilitated the creation of software that would provide quotations, sales contracts, job orders, client registration, listing of new items, and automatically send quotation emails to clients. By doing so, I was able to introduce and encourage methodologies and best practices that enhanced the product and customized it to suit user needs.

Working with a small team, I contributed software development expertise toward the implementation of critical software systems and drove all phases of integration. This involved conducting internet research to create a systematically structured approach to integrate the software as well as using Crystal Reports to gather and present multiple sources of data. Being in a leadership position was also beneficial, as it gave me the opportunity to improve my proficiency in management and delegation.

dev_blurb:
I have a lot of experience in different areas of iOS development. I’m an enthralled programmer and like to build an applications for already existing projects as well as for projects from scratch. My goal is to reach a clear understanding with the client and to solve the existing problems. During my experience, I have collaborated with different clients from individual to companies and helped them to find best solutions for their problems. My strengths are creativeness and responsibility.

My skills area:

[Programming skills]
- Objective-C/Swift: more than 3 years
- Strong knowledge of clean architecture and programming patterns
- Moderate experience with SQL, C/C++, NodeJS, .NET
- Understanding multi threaded and asynchronous code
- Experience with profiling and testing
- Ability to write clean and documented code
- Experience with refactoring and supporting existing code

[Technologies]
- Strong knowledge of iOS SDK
- Ability to create flexible UI for iPhone/iPad
- Data storages: CoreData, SQL, NoSQL
- Comprehensive understanding of client-server communication (HTTP, TCP, UDP)
- Experience with offline storages and data synchronization across devices
- Ability to use dependency managers: Cocoa Pods, Carthage
- Experience with continuous integration (Fastlane, Circle-CI)
- Familiar with version control systems: Git, HG, SVN
- Ability to integrate apps with social networks: (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Google)

[List of already used third-party frameworks]
AFNetworking, Alamofire, SQLite, FMDatabase, Google Maps, MapBox, Parse, ParseLiveQuery, Quickblox, PubNub, FireBase, Bolts, Facebook's SDKs, Typhoon.

Don't hesitate to contact me if you have something interesting to develop. I will be glad to answer your questions.

I give a guarantee for the support of the finished product within six months and Fix our bugs for free.

feedback.comment: Nick was really great to work with. Very responsive and knows his stuff well. I will hire him again.

skill.skl_description: Xcode is a suite of tools developed by Apple for developing software for Mac OS X and iOS, first released in 2003.

C++ (pronounced "cee plus plus") is a statically typed, free-form, multi-paradigm, compiled, general-purpose programming language. It is regarded as an intermediate-level language, as it comprises a combination of both high-level and low-level language features.

iOS (formerly iPhone OS) is Apple Inc.'s mobile operating system. Originally developed for the iPhone, it has since been extended to support other Apple, Inc. devices such as the iPod Touch, iPad, and Apple TV.

The iPad is a line of tablet computers designed, developed and marketed by Apple Inc., primarily as a platform for audio-visual media including books, periodicals, movies, music, games, and web content.

An iPhone App is an application software developed with the iOS SDK for use with Apple, Inc.'s iPhone line of smartphones. Apps have diverse functions, including games, reference, GPS navigation, social networking, security, and advertising for television shows, films, and celebrities.

JavaScript is a prototype-based scripting language that is dynamic, weakly typed and has first-class functions. It is a multi-paradigm language, supporting object-oriented, imperative, and functional programming styles.
Objective-C is a reflective, object-oriented programming language that adds Smalltalk-style messaging to the C programming language.
Structured Query Language (SQL) is a programming language designed for managing data in relational database management systems (RDBMS).
SQLite is a relational database management system contained in a C programming library.
Swift is a multi-paradigm, compiled programming language developed by Apple for iOS and OS X development.

skill.skl_description: Adobe Photoshop is a graphics editing program developed and published by Adobe Systems Incorporated.

Graphic design is a creative process - most often involving a client and a designer and usually completed in conjunction with producers of form (i.e., printers, signmakers, etc.) _ undertaken in order to convey a specific message (or messages) to a targeted audience.
The iPad is a line of tablet computers designed and marketed by Apple Inc., which runs on Apple's iOS operating system.
The iPhone is a line of smartphones designed and marketed by Apple Inc.
Sketch by Bohemian Coding is a vector creation application for Mac.

User interface design or user interface engineering is the design of computers, appliances, machines, mobile communication devices, software applications, and websites with the focus on the user's experience and interaction.

User experience design (UXD or UED) is the process of enhancing customer satisfaction and loyalty by improving the usability, ease of use, and pleasure provided in the interaction between the customer and the product.
Web design is the process of planning and creating a website. Text, images, digital media and interactive elements are used by web designers to produce the page seen on the web browser.

dev_blurb:
Each book is individual and unique.

Over the past 18 years I have produced everything from corporate reports, product catalogs, presentations, lead magnets, infographics, to children’s books and cookbooks. The fact that I designed Sweden’s first cookbook centered around using insects, goes a long way in painting a picture of the scope I cover.

Since each book is different, this must be reflected in the design.

Every book is a learning experience for me, and I find that I often cannot refrain from reading the books I design. Do you know how to say “lonely” in Jamaican? ”Deggeh-Deggeh”. Do you know which is bird is the national bird of Nigeria? I do: it’s the malimbe. :-)

Working with books is a wonderful place to be in!

I want to design a book for you that will make your pages come to life.

Tell me about the book or publication YOU have.

job.as_opening_title: Design and layout together e-cook book
Need layout and page designs for my Daily Planner

feedback.comment: I am so grateful to have had the pleasure to work with Raphael on my project. I needed to create clean and professional page designs and I had the ideas and concepts in mind but no idea how to actually create them. Raphael was so good at taking my ideas and concepts and turning them into reality in my page designs. He would even improvise and add his own creative twist to some of my concepts that ended up looking amazing. I would have never thought I could create page designs that would turn out so perfect but it was possible through Upwork and I hit a home-run with Raphael, I will forever be grateful for meeting and working together with him. Raphael is a true professional and was attentive to every detail and made every slight edit that I requested promptly and with no questions asked. I'm sad to end my contract with Raphael but I definitley plan on staying connected with him for projects I want to take on in the future. Raphael is seriously amazing, just hire him for your project and don't look back. Trust me
